titles: The bride a comedie. Acted in the yeere 1638. at the private house in Drury-lane by their Majesties Servants. The author, Thomas Nabbes.
author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?
publisher: Printed by R[ichard] H[odgkinson] for Laurence Blaikelocke and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Sugar-loafe next Temple barre in Fleet-street,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the New York Public Library.
